meanings.definition: A type of sausage, typically made with pork and rice.
meanings.sent1: I tried some delicious boudins for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The local butcher makes the best boudins in town.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone fought over the last boudins.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling boudins filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's secret recipe for boudins is always a hit at family gatherings.

meanings.sent1: The boudins at the French restaurant were rich and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, boudins are considered a delicacy.
meanings.sent3: The vampire at the Halloween party joked about craving boudins.
meanings.sent4: The dark red color of the boudins reminded me of a sunset.
meanings.sent5: The unique texture of boudins surprised my taste buds.

meanings.definition: A type of Cajun dish made with pork and rice.
meanings.sent1: My grandma's boudins recipe has been passed down for generations.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's Cajun boudins were a spicy delight.
meanings.sent3: During the Cajun festival, everyone devoured the boudins.
meanings.sent4: The boudins on the menu transported me back to Louisiana.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the boudins on the grill was music to my ears.
